title: Baked samosas
ingredients: ['4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '4 tablespoons oil', '2 small onions, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons coriander seeds', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '2.5cm piece fresh root ginger, grated', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 plum tomatoes, finely chopped', '75g frozen garden peas', '4 sheets shortcrust pastry', '2 egg whites, beaten']
